verses.verse: "Now at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8269>prince<s%> who <S%H5975>stands<s%> [guard] <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> will <S%H5975>arise.<s%> And there will be a <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>distress<s%> <S%H834>such<s%> as <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H1961>occurred<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> there was a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> that <S%H6256>time;<s%> and at that <S%H6256>time<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3605>everyone<s%> who is <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book,<s%> will be <S%H4422>rescued.<s%>

"And <S%H7227>many<s%> of those <S%H3463>who<s%> <S%H3463>sleep<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> will <S%H9516>awake,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> to <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H9132>life,<s%> but the <S%H428>others<s%> to <S%H2781>disgrace<s%> [and] <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1860>contempt.<s%>

"And those who <S%H7919>have<s%> <S%H7919>insight<s%> will <S%H9100>shine<s%> <S%H9100>brightly<s%> like the <S%H2096>brightness<s%> of the <S%H7549>expanse<s%> of <S%H7549>heaven,<s%> and those who <S%H6663>lead<s%> the <S%H7227>many<s%> to <S%H6663>righteousness,<s%> like the <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

"But as for you, <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H5640>conceal<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> and <S%H2856>seal<s%> up the <S%H5612>book<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H6256>time;<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> will <S%H7751>go<s%> <S%H7751>back<s%> and <S%H7751>forth,<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> will <S%H7235>increase.<s%>"

Then I, <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H312>others<s%> were <S%H5975>standing,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> on <S%H2008>this<s%> <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H2975>river,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> on that <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H2975>river.<s%>

And one <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>dressed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H2975>river,<s%> <S%H4970>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> [will it be] <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7093>end<s%> of [these] <S%H6382>wonders<s%>?"

And I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>dressed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H2975>river,<s%> as he <S%H7311>raised<s%> his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> and his <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore<s%> by Him <S%H2416>who<s%> <S%H2416>lives<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> that it would be for a <S%H4150>time,<s%> <S%H4150>times,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> [a time;] and as soon as they <S%H3615>finish<s%> <S%H5310>shattering<s%> the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [events] will be <S%H3615>completed.<s%>
As for me, I <S%H8085>heard<s%> but could not <S%H995>understand;<s%> so I <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> [will be] the <S%H319>outcome<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> [events?]"

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> [your way,] <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> for [these] <S%H1697>words<s%> are <S%H5640>concealed<s%> and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> up <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7093>end<s%> <S%H6256>time.<s%>

<S%H7227>"Many<s%> will be <S%H1305>purged,<s%> <S%H3835>purified<s%> and <S%H6884>refined;<s%> but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H7561>act<s%> <S%H7561>wickedly,<s%> and <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H995>understand,<s%> but those who <S%H7919>have<s%> <S%H7919>insight<s%> will <S%H995>understand.<s%>

"And from the <S%H6256>time<s%> that the <S%H8548>regular<s%> <S%H8548>sacrifice<s%> is <S%H5493>abolished,<s%> and the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> of <S%H8074>desolation<s%> is <S%H5414>set<s%> up, [there will be] 1290 <S%H3117>days.<s%>
"How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is he who keeps <S%H2442>waiting<s%> and <S%H5060>attains<s%> to the 1335 <S%H3117>days!<s%>

"But as for you, <S%H1980>go<s%> [your way] to the <S%H7093>end;<s%> then you will <S%H5117>enter<s%> into <S%H5117>rest<s%> and <S%H5975>rise<s%> [again] for your <S%H1486>allotted<s%> <S%H1486>portion<s%> at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of the <S%H3117>age.<s%>"
